reviews.review: Картинка красивая, физика хорошая, карт много, радует наличие старый добрых de_dust и остальных в этом же духе. Я рекомендую эту игру!
Awesome, Strategy meets FPS. Brilliant game.
回血神作 得装备卖了很快就回本了！
Fantastico, está mais rapido, mais focado, e deu uma revitalizada muito boa!!
Great game love the new updated graphics. This brings back so many memories of old and glad this is out

very good game! love it! aaahwww<3

nominated for best game of all time

Amazing game. If you enjoyed Source then you will love CS: GO. 

Arms Race is fun. You have to kill 25 enemies. Each with a different weapon then the last person you have to kill with a knife.

Demolition works in the same way but you team switch halfway through.
It's CS. Give volvo the moneyz
Updated graphics and effects from counterstrike source, but essentially the same game. Needs more destructable environments, add on for guns.
Recomand ! Best shoter game ! Merita premiul anului ! :D

This game is great like original one. CS style + good graphic.

Only problem is it took long time to create a server for multiplayer mode.
But it still better than many FPS games after all.
Cs c'est comme la clope, on te dis que ça n'est pas bon et que c'est mauvais pour la santé mais tu y goûtes quand même et tu finis accro a ce jeu de ses daronnes.

Gra utrzymuje klimat starszych wersji cs'a, jednakze wiele nowych opcji dodaje zastrzyk pozytywnej energii, gdyz uwazam ze Valve idealnie spelnilo oczekiwania kazdego gracza. Gre oceniam na 8/10 gdyz znalazlem kilka malych niedociagniec, oraz system rank nie jest zbyt sprawiedliwy. Gra jest naprawde godna polecenia,
I recomend este game because... Suck my di*k madaka
this is a very good game

i recommend playing the other game modes in rank so tdm, arms race, demolition and casual before you start playing competetive otherwise you will get rekt kid m8 fite me irl m8 ill hook you inda gabba m8

if you love FPS then buy the damn game already lol,it is a really great game to play,ive got countless hours of playtime in and i don't regret any of the time ive spent in this game,buy it,you won't regret it :)
Great addtion to the source series. Would reccomend it to anyone.
Yeah so you shoot people and they die and all is alright.
This is an awesome FPS based on CS:S.  I really recommend this to players with no life.

Just like CS:Source, CS:GO has absolutely nothing close to CS 1.3-1.6 whatsoever. Bought it and hated it, simple as that. Just another CoD-like shit.
